thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 687janetter
title: Great Location
text: Ended up staying at this Premier Inn due to a last minute business trip and limited availability elsewhere, it actually turned out great, it was cheaper than other locations and with Stratford international so close its adjust a case of jumping on the fast train to where I needed to be in 6 minutes, plus the bonus of the Westfeild shopping centre too,I'd definitely recommend this premier inn.
